definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements

sentences.english: Andre says here's a clear principle,the most particular.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈说这里有一个明确的原则，最个人的。

sentences.english: He assures Andre that he will soon get to Teri and Kim.
sentences.chinese: 他叫安德烈放心，他马上会着手“解决”泰瑞和金姆。

sentences.english: Igor Andreev said the Americans were just too strong.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈夫说美国人太强了。

sentences.english: I always saw Andre playing with motivation and passion.
sentences.chinese: 我总是看到安德烈充满动力和激情的比赛。

sentences.english: Days before the licence was granted, Andreas died.
sentences.chinese: 可是，就在拿到执照的前几天，安德烈亚斯去世了。

sentences.english: is always the weightier morally, Andre?
sentences.chinese: 总是道德上更重要的，安德烈？

sentences.english: Joining Jennifer and Karen on the CD are Andrea Niemiec on the string double bass and Terry Ostergaard on the bodhran.
sentences.chinese: 双低音伴奏是安德烈尼米克，鼓手是特里厄斯特高。

sentences.english: And he began expounding to Prince Andrey freemasonry , as he understood it.
sentences.chinese: 于是他开始向安德烈公爵叙述他所了解的共济会。

sentences.english: Prince Andrey looked inquiringly at him and made no reply.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈公爵疑惑地望望交谈的人，什么话也没有回答。

sentences.english: As he releases Victor, Andre shoots DeSalvo anyway.
sentences.chinese: 他这边放下了维克多，那边安德烈还是射杀了迪沙佛。

sentences.english: Andrea's dream is to perform in a national theater group.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈亚的梦想是在国际化的剧团演出。

sentences.english: Prince Andrey went round the bed and kissed her on the forehead.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈公爵从沙发一旁绕过去，吻了吻她的额角。

sentences.english: On the way he was told of the death of his brother-in-law, Anatole, and of the death of Prince Andrey.
sentences.chinese: 在路上，皮埃尔得知他的内兄和安德烈公爵的死讯。

sentences.english: But Andrea and I are eating at (Wing Lei) three out of seven nights a week.
sentences.chinese: 我和安德烈一周7个晚上得有3个晚上是在永雷吃的。

sentences.english: Prince Andrey could not help smiling as he glanced at Captain Tushin.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈公爵望了望上尉，情不自禁地微微一笑。

sentences.english: Andre gives the signal to his sharpshooters to release Jack.
sentences.chinese: 安德烈向他手下的神枪手发指令，释放杰克。

definition: Pope Vigilius (in office 537-555)/phonetic -vich or -wich in Russian names
